"I think primaries can have the opportunity of raising the issues and making the Democratic candidate a stronger candidate," Dennis Kucinich said. I think it's safe to predict that Barack Obama will be the nominee of the Democratic Party, but he could be a stronger nominee if he receives a strong challenge in the primary.
